I have eaten at La Fonda many times.  The first time the service was horrible.  The servers ignore you.  If you need eating utensils or plates for your bread the servers don't care- you may need to get up and get it on your own.  Luckily they are available in the middle of the restaurant on racks.  My last visit was February 5, 2014.  The service was bad once again.  My pork tenderloin was so tough you needed a steak knife to cut it and good luck getting a server to bring you one!  We had a group of 6 and ordered the price fix menu 3 course.   I have to say the dessert was the best. I had the chocolate mousse cake.  I do not recommend this  restaurant -it's in a tourist location so they get business they don't deserve!
